Content:
I have an 04 goldwing with Lehman monarch ii trike kit.
The driveshaft broke and no way to get another, either new ir used.
Found a machine shop that made a new shaft but can't cut the splines.
He gave it to someone else who says he will cut the splines, but that was 6 mos ago. Not sure what to do if he decides not to dig the job. Tried several companies to see if they world finish the job but none will do it.
It's a beautiful bike and don't want it to become a lawn ornament.
Any suggestions.
I live in WA state about 100 miles north of Seattle.
